com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2
Class MobileConnectWebInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.MobileConnectWebInterface

public class MobileConnectWebInterface
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience wrapper for Mobile Connect interfaces for use with web applications.

Since:
2.0
See Also:
IDiscoveryService, IAuthenticationService, IIdentityService

Method Detail

attemptDiscovery

public MobileConnectStatus attemptDiscovery(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                            java.lang.String msisdn,
                                            java.lang.String mcc,
                                            java.lang.String mnc,
                                            boolean shouldProxyCookies,
                                            MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Attempt discovery using the supplied parameters. If msisdn, mcc and mnc are null the result will be operator selection, otherwise valid parameters will result in a StartAuthorization status.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
msisdn - MSISDN from user
mcc - Mobile Country Code
mnc - Mobile Network Code
shouldProxyCookies - If cookies from the original request should be sent onto the discovery service
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelection

public MobileConnectStatus attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelection(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                  java.net.URI redirectedUrl)
Attempt discovery using the values returned from the operator selection redirect.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request.
redirectedUrl - Uri redirected to by the completion of the operator selection UI.
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

startAuthentication

public MobileConnectStatus startAuthentication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                               java.lang.String encryptedMsisdn,
                                               java.lang.String state,
                                               java.lang.String nonce,
                                               MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Creates an authorization url with parameters to begin the authentication process.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
encryptedMsisdn - Encrypted MSISDN/Subscriber Id returned from the Discovery process
state - Unique string to be used to prevent Cross Site Forgery Request attacks during request token process (defaults to guid if not supplied, value will be returned in MobileConnectStatus object)
nonce - Unique string to be used to prevent replay attacks during request token process (defaults to guid if not supplied, value will be returned in MobileConnectStatus object)
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

startAuthentication

public MobileConnectStatus startAuthentication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               java.lang.String sdkSession,
                                               java.lang.String encryptedMsisdn,
                                               java.lang.String state,
                                               java.lang.String nonce,
                                               MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Creates an authorization url with parameters to begin the authentication process.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
sdkSession - SDKSession id used to fetch the discovery response with additional parameters that are required to request a token * @param encryptedMsisdn Encrypted MSISDN/Subscriber Id returned from the Discovery process
state - Unique string to be used to prevent Cross Site Forgery Request attacks during request token process (defaults to guid if not supplied, value will be returned in MobileConnectStatus object)
nonce - Unique string to be used to prevent replay attacks during request token process (defaults to guid if not supplied, value will be returned in MobileConnectStatus object)
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

requestToken

public MobileConnectStatus requestToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                        java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                        java.lang.String expectedState,
                                        java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Request token using the values returned from the authorization redirect.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
redirectedUrl - Uri redirected to by the completion of the authorization UI
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile

requestToken

public MobileConnectStatus requestToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        java.lang.String sdkSession,
                                        java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                        java.lang.String expectedState,
                                        java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Request token using the values returned from the authorization redirect.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
sdkSession - SDKSession id used to fetch the discovery response with additional parameters that are required to request a token
redirectedUrl - Uri redirected to by the completion of the authorization UI
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile

handleUrlRedirect

public MobileConnectStatus handleUrlRedirect(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                             java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                             DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                             java.lang.String expectedState,
                                             java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Handles continuation of the process following a completed redirect, the request token url must be provided if it has been returned by the discovery process. Only the request and redirectedUrl are required, however if the redirect being handled is the result of calling the Authorization URL then the remaining parameters are required.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request (required)
redirectedUrl - Url redirected to by the completion of the previous step (required)
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

handleUrlRedirect

public MobileConnectStatus handleUrlRedirect(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                             java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                             java.lang.String sdkSession,
                                             java.lang.String expectedState,
                                             java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Handles continuation of the process following a completed redirect, the request token url must be provided if it has been returned by the discovery process. Only the request and redirectedUrl are required, however if the redirect being handled is the result of calling the Authorization URL then the remaining parameters are required.

Parameters:
request - Originating web request (required)
redirectedUrl - Url redirected to by the completion of the previous step (required)
sdkSession - SDKSession id used to fetch the discovery response with additional parameters that are required to request a token
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the mobile connect process

requestUserInfo

public MobileConnectStatus requestUserInfo(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                           java.lang.String accessToken,
                                           MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Request user info using the access token returned by

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
accessToken - Access token returned from RequestToken required to authenticate the request
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with requested UserInfo information

public MobileConnectStatus requestUserInfo(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           java.lang.String sdkSession,
                                           java.lang.String accessToken,
                                           MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Request user info using the access token returned by

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
sdkSession - SDKSession id used to fetch the discovery response with additional parameters that are required to request a user info
accessToken - Access token returned from RequestToken required to authenticate the request
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with requested UserInfo information

requestIdentity

public MobileConnectStatus requestIdentity(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                           java.lang.String accessToken,
                                           MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Request identity using the access token returned by requestToken( HttpServletRequest, DiscoveryResponse, URI, String, String)

Parameters:
request - Originating web request
discoveryResponse - SDKSession id used to fetch the discovery response with additional parameters that are required to request a identity info
accessToken - Access token returned from RequestToken required to authenticate the request
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with requested identity information
